item.title: Angel Tech
item.description: Undoing Yourself with Energized Meditation and Other Devices the principle of Consciousness itself, which, like the god Hermes. . .travels between worlds without becoming residential to any of them. September 25, 2014 Angel Tech was constructed much like a can-opener. What it describes is secondary to what it opens up as it reads September 25, 2014 utter benevolence and surgical precision by which Life expresses itself through us
